website_summaries.verdict: Onitsuka Tiger reissues their most recognizable pair, the Mexico 66. Still regarded as stylish, the Mexico 66 is available in an abundance of colorway options, textures, and embellishments. Aside from its iconic design, this pair's materials and silhouette have been time-tested and proven to be of superb quality and durability. It also provides adequate comfort for casual use.Ultimately, if you are seeking an affordable shoe that has a stylishly classic design that goes beyond trends this kick might just fit the bill.
pros: Several practical consumers like how versatile the Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 is to be dressed up or down for various occasions
An overwhelming majority of the Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 reviews state that this pair is very comfortable and ideal for all-day wear
This sneaker is deemed by most as a kick with a classic and timeless design
A few users of the shoe have noticed that it is breathable and keeps their feet dry
The shoe is lightweight, which adds to its overall comfort, a  couple of wearers have added
Most shoe users regard this kick's materials to have excellent quality
Some wearers have mentioned that this kick's flexibility makes it a good pair for driving
A few are delighted that it is easy to put on
A significant number of buyers mentioned that the Onitsuka Tiger Mexico 66 shoes are a great product that is worth the price
cons: Most shoe users are disappointed with this kick's lack of cushioning and support
A handful of wearers dislike this pair's thin construction

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they're fake or not
customer_reviews.text: Not sure on these at all. Having had a couple of pairs on Onitsuka before these have a different inner sole and the Onitsuka Tiger logo on the inner sole disappeared after a couple of wears. The size says UK 10 on the purchase but the trainers come closer to a 10.5 or 11 in size. Not 100% convinced these are genuine as feel quite poor quality, had them less than 2 months and already looking for a replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Really nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Onitsuka Tigers. More interesting than Nike or Adidas. The trainers do run large, but are very comfortable. Nice soft leather and well made. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Ferris

customer_reviews.title: In a flap!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well fitting - my only grievance is that pull on flap at the rear which tends to get in the way. It wasn't there on the advertisement photos!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product representation
customer_reviews.text: Actual shoes are a lot more worn out than what is displayed. Had to return and was charged for the return even though I was misled. Poor.
customer_reviews.author: LSD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I wanted them and bought them, fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes as long as they are glued together properly
customer_reviews.text: Both pairs I received made a loud un-sticking sound when walking, on closer inspection the glue bond between the inner sole and the base of the shoe seemed to be the culprit. I have owned many great pairs of Mexico 66's so I really hope this is an isolated issue as the craftsmanship of these is normally excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Manning

customer_reviews.title: 100% according to description and fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favourite band and have lots of different type. This one specifically the most fantastic one. Many Thanks 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRAINERS
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers. They look good and fell good. Highly recommended. Great price to.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Elizabeth Pascall

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes, great quality and very comfortable too. Insoles are nicely padded so I can wear them all day and walk long distances.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Kill Bill...well...close enough!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for style and comfort. The soul is arched and incredible comfortable to walk on. Excellent design and the closest I could find to THOSE shoes 👌
customer_reviews.author: D Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, fit as expected and the delivery arrived two days early. For sure I will buy another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Guardino

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Quality pair of shoes. They look exactly as advertised, not a stitch out of place. Very comfortable, and they seem like they'll last a good long time. There were one or two bits on them that show why they're less than half the retail price; a little defect on one of the heels. But its nothing that concerns me, it looks exactly like the kind of wear the heel my other trainers got after a week. Nothing to worry about at all, but it is noteworthy. Still 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: The training shoes are spot on excellent value for money
customer_reviews.author: Soulboy

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shoes, sent a size too large
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the trainers, but was sent a size too large so I’m going to buy again and hopefully I’ll get the right size this time...
customer_reviews.author: Estella

customer_reviews.title: Game of delight
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer - found them rooomy but thought a size down could pinch. Great for summer and the Game!
customer_reviews.author: S. Eagles

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great product, classic Mexico 66 shoe. It's the third model i have bought during the last 5 years. They last for many years. Some parts of it have lower quality than my previous pair (eg the back "ear tag") but the main body is of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I'm a UK size 10 normally. A better fit would be the 9.5 Quality is all good and they are very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Wowwwww
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about Onitsuka Tiger ... they’re fecking great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chema

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for gym. The flat heels makes it perfect for squats and deadlifts. It fits really well and feels comfortable to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Jalan

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers ever ask Bruce Lee
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes always have very comfortable and look cool
customer_reviews.author: jon price

customer_reviews.title: Quality fit, feel and style
customer_reviews.text: Quality as usual by Asics. A good price and Looks really good with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: K Ali

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable pair.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pair. Looks decent. Goes well with denims or tracksuits. Proper anti flatfoot insole. Great product all around.
customer_reviews.author: KrjuK

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size delivered
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 7 and when they arrived they was a 7 and half unfortunately too big
customer_reviews.author: Vickycable

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my favourite shoes again
customer_reviews.text: Finally found my favourite shoes again...only 8 years after the first pair - if I could find more then I'd buy more. They're not for walking distance but otherwise the comf
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johns

customer_reviews.title: I love my Onitsuka
customer_reviews.text: I buy Onitsuka for a lot of years now and certainly is something different. An excellent choice expecially if you like retro style
customer_reviews.author: An old user

customer_reviews.title: I love these things I'm defiantly going to buy more pairs
customer_reviews.text: I love these things I'm defiantly going to buy more pairs. There made really well and great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: good looking trainers, really cheap price for such a brand, fits good but you should check the size guide of Tiger first, which is different than usual
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: My husband is very happy with these new trainers and is going to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with these new trainers and is going to buy another pair in another colour! Good quality and look really good on.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Please get the sizes clear!
customer_reviews.text: Tigers are an iconic retro shoe. The sizing is unclear. Please be specific, US and UK sizes are different and lead to confusion in ordering.
customer_reviews.author: christopher ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes for the summer (I wear them even during winter) however is a little expensive, less price would be more suitable and not overated
customer_reviews.author: Papailias Eleftherios

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these trainers had them in all colours over the years, good quality
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: You either do or don't like Onitsukas. I do and have done for a ...
customer_reviews.text: You either do or don't like Onitsukas. I do and have done for a while. These are really comfy from the off, like slippers. A perfect fit for a UK9 too.
customer_reviews.author: A W.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant trainers
customer_reviews.text: I've bought thes trainers before. Always find them comfortable, well made and look good as they are not too wide on my size 7 feet!
customer_reviews.author: loubyslim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are my favourite trainers ever and I wear whenever and wherever I can. Most of all the price I purchased these was 60% of what high street retailers in London charge; so, a total bargain. Probably it was a one off, but I am very happy with purchased. I only wished the insole was could be removed so that it is easily cleaned. Other than that, these are great. Delivery was timely and am definitely not returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Une

product_meta.title: Onitsuka Tiger Unisex Adults' Mexico 66 Running Shoes
product_meta.description:
Der Mexico 66 für Damen und Herren von Asics Ontisuka Tiger ist ein sportlicher Sneaker für Alltag und Freizeit.

Die Neuauflage des legendären Kult-Sneaker wurde durch verschiedene klassische Laufschuhe inspiriert.
feature_bullets: Klassische Asics Stripes an der Seite
Verstärkte Ferse sorgt für festen Halt
The Mexico 66 für Damen und Herren von Asics Ontisuka Tiger ist ein sportlicher Sneaker for Alltag und Freizeit.
